sentences.cn: 他对盘尼西林无耐药力.

sentences.en: He could not tolerate the extremes of heat in the desert.
sentences.cn: 他忍受不住沙漠的酷热.

sentences.en: He does not tolerate anyone who mucks him about.
sentences.cn: 他对耍弄他的人毫不客气。

sentences.en: I can just about tolerate it at the moment.
sentences.cn: 当时我差一点就忍受不了了。

sentences.en: I can't tolerate your bad manners any longer.
sentences.cn: 我再也不能容忍你无礼的行为.

sentences.en: Match officials should not tolerate such behaviour but instead enforce the laws of the game.
sentences.cn: 赛事官员不应纵容这种行为，而应严格执行比赛规则。

sentences.en: She can no longer tolerate the position that she's in.
sentences.cn: 她再也受不了自己的处境了.

sentences.en: She can tolerate that rude fellow.
sentences.cn: 她能容忍那个粗鲁的家伙.

sentences.en: The harass-ment had become too much to tolerate and he decided to move out.
sentences.cn: 骚扰越来越过分，他难以忍受，决定搬走。

sentences.en: The teacher cannot tolerate eating on the class.
sentences.cn: 老师不容许在课堂上吃东西.

sentences.en: This plant prefers alkaline soil, though it will readily tolerate some acidity.
sentences.cn: 这种植物在酸性土壤中也能生存, 但碱性土壤更加适宜.

sentences.en: This sort of behaviour will not be tolerated.
sentences.cn: 这种行为是不能容许的。
我们不能容忍他的错误.
我们不能容忍这种浪费现象.

sentences.en: We have to tolerate each other's little foibles.
sentences.cn: 我们得互相容忍对方的小缺点。

sentences.en: We simply will not tolerate vigilante groups on our streets.
sentences.cn: 我们决不容许有自行惩办犯罪的组织出现在我们的街头。

words.tran_cn: 宽容的；容忍的；有耐药力的

trans.tran_en: to allow people to do, say, or believe something without criticizing or punishing them
